captions.text: ItsMeLibbyG asks
Martina, what's it like having a north-american chest in Korea?
Do people look at you weird?
Can you find bras?
As you can see
Simon has not a part in this TL:DR
Because of various reasons...
Whooh you so nasty
Simon has been forbidden to participating anymore
Do you hear me?
Ok, so first off
I wouldn't say that north-american size
I'm sure that there are other parts of the world, like UK and such
have different sizes of chesty sizes
but I know what you are saying
so I have answered this video in our way to pack on things to bring in koREA
but I'm going to go on it more in detail
Not that kind of detail, you dirty minded people
But I'm going to talk about dressing and clothing and how it affects you
So if you are above a C size cup
which I happen to be above that
The quickest answer to it is
No You won't find a bra
Now, yes there will be somewhere out there
that might be a foreign shop from some country
that has a name an import
But can I go to my local mall to get a new bra
and walk inside and buy one?
No, I can't
Thus, I have an entire section in my suitcase
dedicated to big shoes and bras
So the people x-ray place are like
What is this girl doing with weird fetishes?
This entire suitcase is filled with ranch, bras and shoes
It does really suck because Korea has really nice lingerie shops
but they absolutely don't have my size
Now do people look at me weird?
OK,this is a kind of yes and no
I would say no,
they don't look at me weird because I'm not a cleavage showing girl
I've never have been so for example
I have this dress that I wear it in Korea
When I wear this dress,
I always wear a lace or a shell underneath it
You can tell that my boobs are a little bit big
but I'm not comfortable showing it
And in Korea it's not really a Korean thing to show cleavage
Some foreigners are really comfortable wearing low v-cut shirts
but you'll get glanced at more
I wouldn't say it's a negative stare
I would just say it's kinda like a
"WOW That's a shocking and scandals weird"
Now, when you wanna wear a
really, really , really , really short skirt
No, problem
Korea is ok with that
legs, legs, legs
but if you show a cleavage zone
it's kind of a shocking thing
So how would this affect you when you go on a vacation in Korea
or living in Korea?
Well, I will give you a very quick drive by
how to shop clothing in Korea
First and most popular
Free size, that's right
F R E E
means one size fits all
which is not true whatsoever
because  most of the clothing doesn't even come close to fitting me
Can't get over the armpit
Free size clothing is the most popular size of clothing
It's usually dresses like this which looks like
it's cut from one shape
Shopping on the streets
like shopping in underground shopping
all that kind of stuff is free size clothing is very cheap
Majority of clothing would probably not fit you
and they don't usually have change rooms for you to try things on
So unless you've got to know what Korean style free size clothing
I wouldn't recommend buying it
because you just even can't return it
This dress is actually quite long as you guys can see
On a Korean girl I see this all the time passes their knees
but me it's actually like 2 inches above me knees
because of my cleavage and butt
and it ends up bringing the entire dress up
Now, second kind of free size clothing that my favorite kind in Korea is
the really huge like baggy clothing
That one is suppose to big like really loose and baggy on Korean girls
but ends up fitting me like a medium
or like a baggy looking large
Even though it's free size
it might be like extra, extra, extra large section
It might fit you very nicely
so don't pass over those
When it comes to department stores or like a name brand stores
This is an example here
You're gonna looking at sizes between 80 and usually a 100
And 80- 85, those are like really small
extra, extra, small sizes
I usually fall into the biggest categories
so I can do a 100 sometimes they have 105
but it's very rare to find
And those stores usually have change rooms so you can try things on
However, if the dress is like button shut dress
or something that involves a fitted cleavage zone
It might not fit you anyways
even the biggest size for me will fit my body and my waist
but when I try to shut it
the puppies...
they won't stay in
How can I wear this in a way that doesn't sound so pervy ?
BIG BOOBS!!!
um..That's not what I'm going for, Simon!
But you do be aware of that because one time
I may have possibly have gotten stuck inside of a dress
um.. and couldn't escape from the dress
and I was in the changing room for like ten minutes
struggling to get out of the dress that I've got on
and could not get off
Just I kept getting stuck and stuck
It was really embarrassing
The last size you're going to find
If you find these, you're gonna be so happy
This is from UNIQLO and this is from a shop called Valleygirl
And they have XS, S, M , L, AND XL
It's so amazing!
It makes me so happy ~ YAY
UNIQLO is actually from Japan I think
I think there is UNIQLO in New York now
This is a L size dress
It doesn't fit me quite right
like you can see this part, this line should go underneath
but actually goes around here
and you know what?
It's good enough
I could totally pull that off with a belt around my waist
Now, am I normally a L size?
I'm not normally a l size, but you know what?
In Korea, you'll learn to suck it up and not care about numbers anymore
It doesn't matter how big you are
it's what you do with it
oh yah~
looking good
That come across as a really dirty comment
Now if you are lucky enough to find Valleygirl
You will be so happy
Valleygirl does SM, ML, and L
And they only do pretty much cutesy dresses
which still end up being really short on me
So I have to wear like a lithely fluty skirt underneath like a petticoat
now that will come to be your most gigantic peps in Korea
wearing dresses
every dress will be short for you
But, they do have my size
So Valleygirl is one of my absolute favorite
if you can find it
And everything is really cute and pretty
that will make you cry
oh...that dress
has a bunny wearing a hooey and I can't fit in
So that's it for today's TLDR
If you have a question for next week's TLDR
if it doesn't involve boobs and babies
you can leave it under the comment section below in this video
And if you don't have a question to leave
Make sure you glance over the questions
and thumb up the one you like the most
That's it my NASTIES~
for being so nasty
And asking me a nasty question
whooh~ you so nasty~

comments.text:
1: let your dad or whomever would be in charge of taking care of the 
household and privacy read this.

"I'm an online friend  whom you can choose to trust with your address, I 
have something I would like to send for the holidays. I undersatnd if you 
do not trust me with this information. I live out of country and would like 
mailing a gift as I have done with my friends before." 

2: The gift I might send may be of value.
The gift is appropriate XD don't worry. Its a gaming thing. So I would ask 
that if you do not trust me with your address that you not give me a false 
address. Because I would send something of value in the mail for it to be 
lost. 

Its still awhile until the winter holidays! It would be wise to think this 
over and know if you trust me. Me saying "you can trust me" won't do to 
much good. I am just an online friend! I do hope that you would accept the 
gift I got ya'. I've already sent a few early due to sale timing and things 
like that. Thanks.
~Frostgecko / Frostwolf.
